EmailTemplate.name: 17.IPRout.Transport.Railway.D.E.W.19478.RGI recorded debate invitation.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Watch our online debate: The Cybersecure Railway
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> The Cybersecure Railway Watch our interactive debate Digitisation of main line and urban railways is gathering pace as policymakers push operators and infrastructure managers to enhance the capacity and efficiency of their networks. But with the widespread adoption of networked tools comes an increasing need to mitigate the risks posed by cyber threats. Expert speakers: Karsten Oberle Global Parctice Lead Nokia Sharvind Appiah Cyber Security Lead Engineer ERTMS Users Group Paul Dart Rail Technical Lead NCC Group Nick Kingsley (moderator) Managing Editor Railway Gazette Group Connect with us Â© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
